synonyms.synonym: Distinct subgroup of the Ras family member 1

protein.specific_function: Displays low GTPase activity and exist predominantly in the GTP-bound form

go_class.description: hydrolase activity, acting on acid anhydrides
hydrolase activity, acting on acid anhydrides, in phosphorus-containing anhydrides

reference.reference_text: Kontani K, Tada M, Ogawa T, Okai T, Saito K, Araki Y, Katada T: Di-Ras, a distinct subgroup of ras family GTPases with unique biochemical properties. J Biol Chem. 2002 Oct 25;277(43):41070-8. Epub 2002 Aug 22.

Ellis CA, Vos MD, Howell H, Vallecorsa T, Fults DW, Clark GJ: Rig is a novel Ras-related protein and potential neural tumor suppressor. Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A. 2002 Jul 23;99(15):9876-81. Epub 2002 Jul 9.
